metadata.title: CVE-2023-34246 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - high
metadata.description: Doorkeeper is an OAuth 2 provider for Ruby on Rails / Grape. Prior toversion 5.6.6, Doorkeeper automatically processes authorization requestswithout user consent for public clients that have been previous approved.Public clients are inherently vulnerable to impersonation, their identitycannot be assured. This issue is fixed in version 5.6.6.

criterions.comment: ruby-doorkeeper: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
